item.title: Benjamin Trail NP Bi-pod Install
item.dc:creator: robwillisinfo
item.description:
Bi-pods and Air guns      Shooting a big heavy rifle accurately at any range can be tough with out resting it on something or using some sort of bi-pod. I wanted something that was light weight, easy to add or remove and portable. Trying to find information about mounting can be a bit tricky as well, […]

The post Benjamin Trail NP Bi-pod Install first appeared on RobWillis.info.

item.title: Benjamin Trail NP .22 shooting Predator Polymags
item.dc:creator: robwillisinfo
item.category: Benjamin Trail NP .22 shooting Predator Polymags
item.description:
Predator Polymags      These have easily become on of my favorite pellets to shoot. They are a little expensive at around $14 for a tin of 200 from Amazon. However they are worth it as they shoot super straight and are definitely a one shot kill type of ammo. Once you see the expansion of these […]

The post Benjamin Trail NP .22 shooting Predator Polymags first appeared on RobWillis.info.

item.title: Benjamin Trail NP Review with JSB Monsters, Polymags, Crosman Hollow Points & Pointed, and Gamo Rocket Ammo
item.dc:creator: robwillisinfo
item.description:
The Benjamin Trail NP (Nitro Piston)      This thing is an absolute monster and a blast to shoot. It’s extremely powerful shooting a .22 cal pellet @ approx 950 FPS, but extremely quiet in doing so. I picked the rifle up off of Amazon for about $200 and comes with the rifle, Center Point Scope and […]

The post Benjamin Trail NP Review with JSB Monsters, Polymags, Crosman Hollow Points & Pointed, and Gamo Rocket Ammo first appeared on RobWillis.info.

item.title: Modded Crosman 1322 Update
item.dc:creator: robwillisinfo
item.description:
1322 Update      I have to say the Crosman 1322 is a blast to shoot and looks great. Its quiet enough to not bug my neighbors but has plenty of punch to take care of pests. I have just finished my first 500 tin of Crosman Premier Hollow Points, and already have a replacement. That ammo […]

The post Modded Crosman 1322 Update first appeared on RobWillis.info.

item.title: Crosman 1322 Air Pistol, with a few mods…
item.dc:creator: robwillisinfo
item.description:
Crosman 1322      This gun has amazing accuracy and power that’s hard to beat for its $55 price tag. It’s a pump air gun that shoots .22 cal pellets @ 460 FPS. There is also a big aftermarket and following for these guns, making it easy to customize/mod. I opted for a big red dot over […]
